name: EUROCONSULTING s.r.o.
goal:
Our goals are to provide professional consulting services to public and private entities, related to preparation and implementation of EU funded programmes/ projects in agriculture & rural development and regional development sectors.

EuroConsulting provides strategic guidance and institutional support for public sector and also individual project management and guidance under projects from public funds.

Since its establishment in 1999, EuroConsulting has implemented many successful technical assistance projects and grant projects in several key sectors of economic activity.

EuroConsulting is one of Slovakia's leading companies with in-depth experience and long track record of successfully implemented contracts in the area of technical assistance and evaluation of Agriculture & Rural Development and Fisheries programs co-financed by the EU.
interests: Climate Action, Environment, Fisheries and Aquaculture, Information Society, Internal Market, Regional Policy, Research and Technology
euInitiatives:
Since established in 1999 until present, we closely follow the formulation of the EU CAP, with focus on 2nd Pillar and partly EU CFP relevant to EU land-lock countries.
We have elaborated several strategic and analytic documents, including ex-ante, mid-term and ex-post evaluation reports of Agriculture & Rural Development and Fisheries programmes of the Slovak Republic.
customers: Projektové služby,Municipality Bratislava - Zahorska Bystrica,LAG Dolne Zahorie - Leader/CLLD
